text: chaur puok anak kaotakhlach champoh pheap vukavr del min troemte bahpeal champoh puok del bampean knongchamnaom puok anak bonnaohte(te vea ach bahpeal teang anakathveu la ning anak thveu akrak) . chaur puok anak chreab tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh chea anak thveutondakamm yeang khlang kla bamphot
